entry.title: Teacher shares an emotional warning on schools reopening

media:group.media:title: Teacher shares an emotional warning on schools reopening
media:group.media:description:
New Centers for Disease Control and Prevention guidelines on education come down hard in favor of opening schools. Katie O'Connor, a 5th grade teacher in Colorado, joins CNN's Brianna Keilar to discuss the emotional warning she shared about socially distanced learning.
#CNN #News

entry.title: US confirms fighter jet flew close to Iranian passenger plane for inspection

media:group.media:title: US confirms fighter jet flew close to Iranian passenger plane for inspection
media:group.media:description: The US military on Thursday confirmed that one of its fighter jets had flown within a few thousand feet of an Iranian commercial aircraft over Syria to "inspect it," after Iranian state media released videos showing apparently shaken and injured passengers. #CNN #News

entry.title: FAA issues emergency notice about Boeing 737

media:group.media:title: FAA issues emergency notice about Boeing 737
media:group.media:description: CNN's Richard Quest explains why the airline industry, worldwide, will be recovering from the coronavirus pandemic for years to come. #CNN #News

entry.title: Don Lemon: President Trump is beaten by the coronavirus

media:group.media:title: Don Lemon: President Trump is beaten by the coronavirus
media:group.media:description: CNN's Don Lemon gives his take on President Donald Trump announcing that there will not be Republican convention activities in Jacksonville, Florida. #CNN #News

entry.title: Bill Gates on US reopening: We didn't get away with it like we thought

media:group.media:title: Bill Gates on US reopening: We didn't get away with it like we thought
media:group.media:description:
During a CNN coronavirus town hall with Anderson Cooper and Dr. Sanjay Gupta, Microsoft founder Bill Gates says many US states reopened too early and said he doesn't suspect the impact from the pandemic will get better soon.
#BillGates #TownHalll #CNN

entry.title: 'No proof,' Official defends Sweden's controversial Covid-19 move

media:group.media:title: 'No proof,' Official defends Sweden's controversial Covid-19 move
media:group.media:description:
Sweden's State Epidemiologist Anders Tegnell tells CNN's Christiane Amanpour that, despite the country's high mortality rate, the no-lockdown strategy has "served us very well."
#Amanpour #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump called Fox News doctor 'his guide.' CNN's Keilar rolls the tape

media:group.media:title: Trump called Fox News doctor 'his guide.' CNN's Keilar rolls the tape
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brianna Keilar calls out various statements made by Fox News' Dr. Marc Siegel after President Trump praised him during an interview.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump explains why he is canceling Jacksonville RNC activities

media:group.media:title: Trump explains why he is canceling Jacksonville RNC activities
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump announced that there will not be Republican National Convention activities in Jacksonville, Florida. #CNN #News

entry.title: Ocasio-Cortez: Don't need Yoho to apologize. He doesn't want to

media:group.media:title: Ocasio-Cortez: Don't need Yoho to apologize. He doesn't want to
media:group.media:description:
Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) spoke on the House floor about a heated exchange between her and Rep. Ted Yoho (R-FL), saying that by accosting her, he gave "permission to other men to do that to his daughters."
#CNN #News

entry.title: He battled Covid-19 for 128 days. This is what he wants you to know

media:group.media:title: He battled Covid-19 for 128 days. This is what he wants you to know
media:group.media:description:
Larry Kelly earned the nickname "Miracle Larry" after surviving a long battle with the coronavirus, including over 50 days on a ventilator. CNN's Brianna Keilar reports.
#CNN #News

entry.title: The new space race between the United States, China, and the United Arab Emirates

media:group.media:title: The new space race between the United States, China, and the United Arab Emirates
media:group.media:description: CNN's Ivan Watson looks at the the race to Mars between the United States, the United Arab Emirates, and China. #CNN #News

entry.title: China harboring military-linked fugitive scientist at San Francisco consulate, FBI says

media:group.media:title: China harboring military-linked fugitive scientist at San Francisco consulate, FBI says
media:group.media:description: Former Australian Prime Minster Kevin Rudd breaks down the escalating tensions between the United States and China. The US has ordered the Chinese consulate in Houston closed. China has vowed retaliation. #CNN #News

entry.title: Portland mayor is tear-gassed alongside protesters

media:group.media:title: Portland mayor is tear-gassed alongside protesters
media:group.media:description: CNN Security Correspondent Josh Campbell reports from Portland, Oregon, about the civil unrest between protesters and federal agents. Portland Mayor Ted Wheeler was among the protesters when federal agents used tear gas on them. #CNN #News

media:group.media:title: 1 number that proves 2020 is *nothing* like 2016
media:group.media:description:
In 2016, the vast majority of political insiders gave Donald Trump a very slim chance of winning, which is a fact he likes to remind people often. This is why people do not like to make assessments of the President's current dismal political position. Chris Cillizza explains why this is a mistake in 2020.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: 1 number that proves 2020 is *nothing* like 2016 https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/16/politics/2020-election-polling-comparison-2016/index.html
Democrats Poised to Control the Senate https://www.insideelections.com/news/article/2020-senate-overview-july-10-2020-democrats-poised-to-control-the-senate
2020 Electoral College Ratings https://cookpolitical.com/sites/default/files/2020-07/EC%20Ratings071420.pdf
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Steven Sevilla Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #2020

entry.title: Fact check: Trump suggests protests led to rise in Covid-19 cases

media:group.media:title: Fact check: Trump suggests protests led to rise in Covid-19 cases
media:group.media:description: CNN’s Daniel Dale fact-checks President Trump’s claim that Covid-19 cases “started to rise among young Americans shortly after demonstrations,” referring to the racial justice protests in response to the killing of George Floyd. #CNN #News
